articles.title: √âcrire une lettre d'amour en roumain : Le dor en mots
articles.content:
## L'art de la scrisoare de dragoste roumaine

Le roumain, langue latine des Carpates, offre des expressions impr√©gn√©es de "dor" - ce manque nostalgique si roumain.

## Formules d'ouverture

### "Iubirea mea" / "Dragostea mea"
**Prononciation :** you-BI-r√©a M√âA / dra-GOS-t√©a M√âA

**Signification :** Mon amour

### "Sufletul meu"
**Prononciation :** sou-FL√â-toul M√â-ou

**Signification :** Mon √¢me

## Exprimer l'amour profond

### "E»ôti cel mai bun lucru care mi s-a √Ænt√¢mplat"
**Prononciation :** y√©chti tch√©l ma√Ø BOUN LOU-krou KA-r√© mi sa un-tum-PLAT

**Signification :** Tu es la meilleure chose qui me soit arriv√©e

### "Inima mea √Æ»õi apar»õine pentru totdeauna"
**Prononciation :** I-ni-ma M√âA utsi a-par-TSI-n√© P√âN-trou tot-d√©-A-ou-na

**Signification :** Mon c≈ìur t'appartient pour toujours

### "Cu fiecare zi te iubesc mai mult"
**Prononciation :** kou fi√®-KA-r√© zi t√© you-B√âSK ma√Ø MOULT

**Signification :** Chaque jour je t'aime davantage

## Expressions po√©tiques

### "E»ôti poezia pe care sufletul meu o cƒÉuta"
**Prononciation :** y√©chti po-√©-ZI-a p√© KA-r√© sou-FL√â-toul M√â-ou o ka-OU-ta

**Signification :** Tu es la po√©sie que mon √¢me cherchait

### "√én ochii tƒÉi am gƒÉsit casa mea"
**Prononciation :** un O-ki√Ø ta√Ø am ga-SIT KA-sa M√âA

**Signification :** Dans tes yeux j'ai trouv√© ma maison

### "E»ôti azi-ul meu »ôi toate m√¢inele mele"
**Prononciation :** y√©chti a-ZI-oul M√â-ou chi TOA-t√© mu-i-n√©-l√© M√â-l√©

**Signification :** Tu es mon aujourd'hui et tous mes lendemains

## Engagements et promesses

### "Promit sƒÉ te iubesc la bine »ôi la greu"
**Prononciation :** pro-MIT sa t√© you-B√âSK la BI-n√© chi la GR√âOU

**Signification :** Je promets de t'aimer dans les bons et les mauvais moments

### "Voi fi mereu alƒÉturi de tine"
**Prononciation :** vo√Ø fi m√©-R√â-ou a-la-OU-ri d√© TI-n√©

**Signification :** Je serai toujours √† tes c√¥t√©s

## Formules de conclusion

### "Al tƒÉu/A ta pentru totdeauna"
**Prononciation :** al TA-ou/a TA P√âN-trou tot-d√©-A-ou-na

**Signification :** √Ä toi pour toujours

### "Cu toatƒÉ dragostea mea"
**Prononciation :** kou TOA-ta dra-GOS-t√©a M√âA

**Signification :** Avec tout mon amour

## Le concept de Dor

Int√©grez ce mot unique roumain :
"√émi e dor de tine chiar c√¢nd e»ôti l√¢ngƒÉ mine" (Tu me manques m√™me quand tu es pr√®s de moi)

## Conseils culturels

**Po√©sie valoris√©e :** Citer Eminescu impressionnera.

**Galanterie :** Les gestes romantiques traditionnels sont appr√©ci√©s.

## Conclusion

Une lettre d'amour en roumain chante avec le dor de cette belle langue latine. Dragostea adevƒÉratƒÉ se scrie cu inima. (Le vrai amour s'√©crit avec le c≈ìur.)

articles.title: Niemiecka wymowa dla poczƒÖtkujƒÖcych: Jak m√≥wiƒá do swojego partnera bez b≈Çƒôd√≥w
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Zastanawiasz siƒô, jak wym√≥wiƒá "Ich liebe dich" bez obciachu? Twoja niemiecka po≈Ç√≥wka ≈õmieje siƒô, gdy m√≥wisz "ich" zamiast "ikh"? Spokojnie - ka≈ºdy to przechodzi! Dzisiaj nauczycie siƒô razem podstaw niemieckiej wymowy, kt√≥re sprawiƒÖ, ≈ºe [romantyczne niemieckie frazy](/learn/pl/de/romantic-german-phrases-for-every-occasion/) bƒôdƒÖ brzmia≈Çy naturalnie i piƒôknie.

<PhraseOfDay
  word="Ich liebe dich"
  translation="Kocham ciƒô"
  pronunciation="ikh LEE-beh dikh"
  context="Najwa≈ºniejsza fraza w twoim zwiƒÖzku - warto jƒÖ dobrze wymawiaƒá!"
/>

## Proste zasady, kt√≥re zmieniƒÖ twojƒÖ wymowƒô

Niemiecki nie musi byƒá trudny! Oto kilka trik√≥w, kt√≥re natychmiast poprawiƒÖ twojƒÖ wymowƒô:

### 1. "Ch" nie jest "h"
- **Ich** (ja) ‚Üí wymawiaj **ikh** (jakby≈õ garglingowa≈Ç lekko)
- **Dich** (ciebie) ‚Üí **dikh**
- **Buch** (ksiƒÖ≈ºka) ‚Üí **bukh**

<VocabCard
  word="Ich"
  translation="Ja"
  pronunciation="ikh"
  example="Ich m√∂chte mit dir sprechen."
/>

### 2. "R" wymawiaj w gardle
Niemieckie "r" nie jest polskie! To d≈∫wiƒôk gard≈Çowy - jakby≈õ pr√≥bowa≈Ç wym√≥wiƒá "g" bez zatrzymywania powietrza.

<VocabCard
  word="Liebe"
  translation="Mi≈Ço≈õƒá"
  pronunciation="LEE-beh"
  example="Meine Liebe f√ºr dich w√§chst t√§glich."
/>

### 3. "W" = "F"
Tak, to dziwne, ale "w" wymawia siƒô jak "f":
- **Wasser** ‚Üí **FAH-ser**
- **Wie** ‚Üí **fee**
- **Wo** ‚Üí **foh**

## Alfabet i d≈∫wiƒôki, kt√≥re musisz znaƒá

### Niemieckie litery specjalne

| Litera | Wymowa | Przyk≈Çad | T≈Çumaczenie |
|--------|---------|----------|-------------|
| **√§** | jak "e" w "sen" | **K√§se** | ser |
| **√∂** | jak "eu" w francuskim "peu" | **sch√∂n** | piƒôkny |
| **√º** | jak "i" w "film" | **f√ºr** | dla |
| **√ü** | "ss" | **Stra√üe** | ulica |

<CultureTip flag="üá©üá™" title="Uwa≈ºaj na te litery!">
Niemcy naprawdƒô zwracajƒÖ uwagƒô na poprawnƒÖ wymowƒô √§, √∂, √º. ≈πle wym√≥wione "sch√∂n" (piƒôkny) mo≈ºe brzmieƒá jak "schon" (ju≈º) - zupe≈Çnie co innego!
</CultureTip>

### Ukryte kombinacje liter

<ConjugationTable
  verb="Diphtongs"
  meaning="Wymowa"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "ei", polish: "aj", english: "wie in 'mein'" },
    { person: "ie", polish: "i d≈Çugie", english: "wie in 'sie'" },
    { person: "eu", polish: "oj", english: "wie in 'Freund'" },
    { person: "√§u", polish: "oj", english: "wie in 'Fr√§ulein'" },
    { person: "ch", polish: "kh", english: "nach (po), auch (te≈º)" },
    { person: "sch", polish: "sz", english: "Schule, sch√∂n" }
  ]}
/>

## Romantyczne s≈Çowa - poprawna wymowa

Gotowy na [niemieckie s≈Çodkie imiona dla partnera](/learn/pl/de/german-pet-names-for-your-partner/)? Oto najwa≈ºniejsze:

| Niemiecki | Polski | Wymowa | U≈ºycie |
|-----------|---------|---------|---------|
| **Schatz** | skarb | shahts | "Mein Schatz" - m√≥j skarb |
| **Liebling** | kochanie | LEE-bling | "Mein Liebling" - moje kochanie |
| **S√º√üe** | s≈Çodki | Z√ú-seh | do s≈Çodkiej dziewczyny |
| **S√º√üer** | s≈Çodki | Z√ú-ser | do s≈Çodkiego ch≈Çopaka |
| **Herz** | serce | herts | "Mein Herz" - moje serce |

<VocabCard
  word="Engel"
  translation="Anio≈Ç"
  pronunciation="EHN-gel"
  example="Du bist mein Engel."
/>

## Praktyczne zdania dla par

### Codzienne rozmowy

1. **"Wie war dein Tag?"** - *Jak by≈Ç tw√≥j dzie≈Ñ?* (vee vahr dajn tahg)
2. **"Ich vermisse dich"** - *Tƒôskniƒô za tobƒÖ* (ikh fer-MISS-eh dikh)
3. **"Du machst mich gl√ºcklich"** - *Czynisz mnie szczƒô≈õliwym* (doo mahkhst mikh GL√úK-likh)
4. **"Kann ich dich umarmen?"** - *Czy mogƒô ciƒô przytuliƒá?* (kahn ikh dikh OOM-ar-men)
5. **"Du siehst sch√∂n aus"** - *≈Åadnie wyglƒÖdasz* (doo zeest shurn ows)
6. **"Ich bin stolz auf dich"** - *Jestem z ciebie dumny* (ikh bin shtoltz owf dikh)
7. **"Guten Morgen, mein Schatz"** - *Dzie≈Ñ dobry, m√≥j skarb* (GOO-ten MOR-gen main shahts)

<CultureTip flag="üá©üá™" title="Intonacja jest kluczowa!">
Niemcy czƒôsto pytajƒÖ podnoszƒÖc g≈Ços na ko≈Ñcu zdania. "Du kommst mit?" brzmi naturalniej ni≈º p≈Çaska wymowa. ƒÜwiczcie razem!
</CultureTip>

## Najczƒôstsze b≈Çƒôdy Polak√≥w

### 1. "Ich" vs "I≈°"
‚ùå **B≈ÇƒÖd:** M√≥wienie "i≈° liebe dich"
‚úÖ **Poprawnie:** "ikh LEE-beh dikh"

### 2. "U" vs "√ú"
‚ùå **B≈ÇƒÖd:** "fuer" zamiast "f√ºr"
‚úÖ **Poprawnie:** "f√ºr" (z d≈∫wiƒôkiem "i" jak w "film")

### 3. "R" na ko≈Ñcu
‚ùå **B≈ÇƒÖd:** Niemym "r"
‚úÖ **Poprawnie:** Gard≈Çowe "r" we wszystkich pozycjach

### 4. D≈Çugo≈õƒá samog≈Çosek
‚ùå **B≈ÇƒÖd:** "liebe" kr√≥tko
‚úÖ **Poprawnie:** "LEE-beh" (d≈Çugie "ee")

## Szybka ≈õciƒÖga do zdjƒôcia

```
NIEMIECKIE WYMOGA - SKR√ìT

Ch ‚Üí kh (ich = ikh)
Sch ‚Üí sz (sch√∂n = szurn)
W ‚Üí f (wann = fahn)
R ‚Üí gard≈Çowe
√§ ‚Üí e (K√§se = KEH-zeh)
√∂ ‚Üí eu (sch√∂n = szurn)
√º ‚Üí i (f√ºr = fir)
ei ‚Üí aj (mein = majn)
ie ‚Üí i (sie = zee)
eu ‚Üí oj (Freund = frojnt)
```

## Co dalej na waszej wsp√≥lnej drodze?

Opanowali≈õcie podstawy? Super! Teraz czas na [podstawowe zwroty dla par](/learn/pl/de/essential-german-phrases-for-couples/) i [s≈Çownictwo na randkƒô](/learn/pl/de/german-date-night-vocabulary/). Pamiƒôtaj - codzienna praktyka z partnerem to najlepszy spos√≥b na perfekcyjnƒÖ wymowƒô!

<CTA />

articles.title: Portugalsk√© flirtovac√≠ fr√°ze pro ƒåechy
articles.content:
Portugal≈°tina je melodick√Ω jazyk pln√Ω v√°≈°nƒõ a romantiky. A≈• u≈æ m√°te partnera z Portugalska nebo Braz√≠lie, tyto fr√°ze v√°m pomohou vyj√°d≈ôit sv√© city s autentick√Ωm ≈°armem. Brazilsk√° portugal≈°tina je o nƒõco mƒõkƒç√≠ a expresivnƒõj≈°√≠, zat√≠mco evropsk√° portugal≈°tina m√° tvrd≈°√≠ v√Ωslovnost.

## Z√°kladn√≠ lichotky

### "Voc√™ √© lindo/linda."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Vos√© √© lindo/linda. (BR) / Vos√™ √© lindo/linda. (PT)

**P≈ôeklad:** Jsi kr√°sn√Ω/√°.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Univerz√°ln√≠ lichotka. "Lindo" pro mu≈æe, "linda" pro ≈æeny.

---

### "Voc√™ tem um sorriso maravilhoso."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Vos√© tem um sorizo maravil√≥zo.

**P≈ôeklad:** M√°≈° √∫≈æasn√Ω √∫smƒõv.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Specifick√° lichotka, kter√° ukazuje, ≈æe si v≈°√≠m√°te detail≈Ø.

---

### "Eu gosto muito de voc√™."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Eu gosto mujto d≈æi vos√©. (BR)

**P≈ôeklad:** M√°m tƒõ moc r√°d/a.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ n√°klonnosti, kter√© je silnƒõj≈°√≠ ne≈æ prost√© "l√≠b√≠≈° se mi".

---

### "Voc√™ √© incr√≠vel."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Vos√© √© inkr√≠vel.

**P≈ôeklad:** Jsi neuvƒõ≈ôiteln√Ω/√°.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** V≈°estrann√° lichotka pro r≈Øzn√© p≈ô√≠le≈æitosti.

---

## Romantick√© fr√°ze

### "N√£o consigo parar de pensar em voc√™."
**V√Ωslovnost:** N√°um konsigo par√° d≈æi penz√° em vos√©.

**P≈ôeklad:** Nem≈Ø≈æu p≈ôestat myslet na tebe.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Sladk√° zpr√°va bƒõhem dne.

---

### "Voc√™ me faz muito feliz."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Vos√© mi faz mujto felis.

**P≈ôeklad:** Dƒõl√°≈° mƒõ velmi ≈°≈•astn√Ωm/ou.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Up≈ô√≠mn√© vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ ≈°tƒõst√≠ ve vztahu.

---

### "Meu cora√ß√£o bate mais forte por voc√™."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Meu koras√°um baƒçi majs forƒçi por vos√©.

**P≈ôeklad:** Moje srdce bije silnƒõji kv≈Øli tobƒõ.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Romantick√© vyj√°d≈ôen√≠ p≈ôita≈ælivosti.

---

### "Eu sou louco/louca por voc√™."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Eu so loko/loka por vos√©.

**P≈ôeklad:** Jsem do tebe bl√°zen/bl√°zniv√°.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** V√°≈°niv√© prohl√°≈°en√≠.

---

## Hrav√© fr√°ze

### "Voc√™ acredita em amor √† primeira vista ou eu preciso passar de novo?"
**V√Ωslovnost:** Vos√© akred≈æita em amor a primeira vista o eu presizo pas√° d≈æi n√≥vo?

**P≈ôeklad:** Vƒõ≈ô√≠≈° na l√°sku na prvn√≠ pohled, nebo m√°m proj√≠t znovu?

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Klasick√° sv≈Ødn√° fr√°ze s humorem.

---

### "Se beleza fosse tempo, voc√™ seria a eternidade."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Si beleza fosi tempo, vos√© seria a eternidad≈æi.

**P≈ôeklad:** Kdyby kr√°sa byla ƒças, ty bys byla vƒõƒçnost.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Poetick√° lichotka.

---

### "Voc√™ √© a pessoa mais especial que eu j√° conheci."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Vos√© √© a pesoa majs espesi√°l ki eu ≈æa ko≈àesi.

**P≈ôeklad:** Jsi ta nejzvl√°≈°tnƒõj≈°√≠ osoba, kterou jsem kdy poznal/a.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Hlubok√° lichotka pro v√°≈æn√Ω vztah.

---

## Fr√°ze pro zpr√°vy

### "Bom dia, meu amor."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Bom d≈æia, meu amor.

**P≈ôeklad:** Dobr√© r√°no, l√°sko.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** Sladk√Ω zp≈Øsob, jak zaƒç√≠t partner≈Øv den.

---

### "Estou com saudades de voc√™."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Esto kom saudad≈æis d≈æi vos√©.

**P≈ôeklad:** St√Ωsk√° se mi po tobƒõ.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** "Saudade" je unik√°tn√≠ portugalsk√Ω koncept ‚Äì hlubok√° nostalgick√° touha po nƒõkom.

---

### "Mal posso esperar para te ver."
**V√Ωslovnost:** Mal poso esper√° para ƒçi ver.

**P≈ôeklad:** Nem≈Ø≈æu se doƒçkat, a≈æ tƒõ uvid√≠m.

**Kdy pou≈æ√≠t:** P≈ôed pl√°novan√Ωm setk√°n√≠m.

---

## Kulturn√≠ tipy

**Braz√≠lie vs. Portugalsko:** Brazilci jsou obecnƒõ expresivnƒõj≈°√≠ a p≈ô√°tel≈°tƒõj≈°√≠. Portugalci mohou b√Ωt zpoƒç√°tku rezervovanƒõj≈°√≠.

**Saudade:** Tento koncept je kl√≠ƒçov√Ω pro portugalskou kulturu ‚Äì vyjad≈ôuje hlubokou touhu po nƒõkom nep≈ô√≠tomn√©m.

**Osloven√≠:** "Amor" (l√°sko), "querido/a" (drah√Ω/√°), "meu bem" (m≈Øj mil√Ω) jsou bƒõ≈æn√°.

**Fyzick√Ω kontakt:** Brazilci jsou v√≠ce fyzicky expresivn√≠ ‚Äì objet√≠ a polibky na tv√°≈ô jsou bƒõ≈æn√©.

S tƒõmito fr√°zemi okouzl√≠te sv√©ho portugalsky mluv√≠c√≠ho partnera s autenticitou.

articles.title: Expresii de Flirt √Æn EnglezƒÉ pentru Rom√¢ni
articles.content:
Flirtul este o artƒÉ delicatƒÉ care transcende grani»õele lingvistice. C√¢nd e»ôti √Æntr-o rela»õie cu cineva care vorbe»ôte englezƒÉ, sƒÉ »ôtii cum sƒÉ flirtezi √Æn limba lor poate adƒÉuga o dimensiune specialƒÉ conexiunii voastre. Acest ghid te va ajuta sƒÉ stƒÉp√¢ne»ôti arta flirtului √Æn englezƒÉ.

## De Ce SƒÉ √énve»õi Expresii de Flirt √Æn EnglezƒÉ?

√éntr-o rela»õie interculturalƒÉ, limbajul joacƒÉ un rol crucial √Æn men»õinerea romantismului. C√¢nd po»õi sƒÉ-»õi surprinzi partenerul cu complimente »ôi replici jucƒÉu»ôe √Æn limba lor maternƒÉ, arƒÉ»õi cƒÉ √Æ»õi pasƒÉ sƒÉ te conectezi cu ei la un nivel mai profund.

## Expresii Esen»õiale de Flirt

### Complimente Clasice

<Phrase>
  <Original>You look stunning tonight.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Iu luc staning tunait.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>ArƒÉ»õi superb √Æn seara asta.</Translation>
  <Context>Perfect pentru o √Ænt√¢lnire romanticƒÉ sau c√¢nd partenerul tƒÉu s-a pregƒÉtit special.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>I can't take my eyes off you.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Ai cant teic mai aiz of iu.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>Nu √Æmi pot lua ochii de la tine.</Translation>
  <Context>ExprimƒÉ fascina»õia intensƒÉ fa»õƒÉ de partenerul tƒÉu.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>You have the most beautiful smile.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Iu hav de moust biutiful smail.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>Ai cel mai frumos z√¢mbet.</Translation>
  <Context>Un compliment sincer care func»õioneazƒÉ √Æn orice situa»õie.</Context>
</Phrase>

### Replici JucƒÉu»ôe

<Phrase>
  <Original>Are you a magician? Because whenever I look at you, everyone else disappears.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Ar iu ƒÉ megishan? Bicoz uenever ai luc et iu, evrivan els disappirs.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>E»ôti magician? Pentru cƒÉ ori de c√¢te ori mƒÉ uit la tine, to»õi ceilal»õi dispar.</Translation>
  <Context>O replicƒÉ jucƒÉu»ôƒÉ care √Æ»õi aratƒÉ sim»õul umorului.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>Is it hot in here, or is it just you?</Original>
  <Transliteration>Iz it hot in hir, or iz it giast iu?</Transliteration>
  <Translation>E cald aici, sau e»ôti doar tu?</Translation>
  <Context>Un cli»ôeu clasic care poate fi folosit √Æn mod ironic pentru a provoca r√¢sul.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again?</Original>
  <Transliteration>Du iu biliv in lav et ferst sait, or »ôud ai uolc bai eghen?</Transliteration>
  <Translation>Crezi √Æn dragostea la prima vedere, sau ar trebui sƒÉ trec pe l√¢ngƒÉ tine din nou?</Translation>
  <Context>O replicƒÉ amuzantƒÉ pentru a destinde atmosfera.</Context>
</Phrase>

### Expresii Romantice Profunde

<Phrase>
  <Original>I fall in love with you more every day.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Ai fol in lav uid iu mor evri dei.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>MƒÉ √ÆndrƒÉgostesc de tine mai mult √Æn fiecare zi.</Translation>
  <Context>Pentru rela»õii stabilite, exprim√¢nd cre»ôterea sentimentelor.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>You make my heart skip a beat.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Iu meic mai hart schip ƒÉ bit.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>√émi faci inima sƒÉ sarƒÉ o bƒÉtaie.</Translation>
  <Context>ExprimƒÉ emo»õia fizicƒÉ pe care o sim»õi √Æn prezen»õa lor.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>I'm so lucky to have you in my life.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Aim so lachi tu hav iu in mai laif.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>Sunt at√¢t de norocos/norocoasƒÉ cƒÉ te am √Æn via»õa mea.</Translation>
  <Context>AratƒÉ recuno»ôtin»õƒÉ »ôi apreciere pentru partener.</Context>
</Phrase>

### Flirt Prin Mesaje

<Phrase>
  <Original>I can't stop thinking about you.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Ai cant stop thinching ebaut iu.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>Nu mƒÉ pot opri din a mƒÉ g√¢ndi la tine.</Translation>
  <Context>Perfect pentru mesaje text c√¢nd sunte»õi departe unul de celƒÉlalt.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>You're my favorite notification.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Iur mai feivrit notifichei»ôƒÉn.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>E»ôti notificarea mea preferatƒÉ.</Translation>
  <Context>Un mesaj modern »ôi drƒÉgu»õ pentru era digitalƒÉ.</Context>
</Phrase>

<Phrase>
  <Original>Wish you were here right now.</Original>
  <Transliteration>Ui»ô iu uer hir rait nau.</Transliteration>
  <Translation>Mi-a»ô dori sƒÉ fii aici chiar acum.</Translation>
  <Context>ExprimƒÉ dorin»õa de a fi √ÆmpreunƒÉ.</Context>
</Phrase>

## Sfaturi Pentru un Flirt Reu»ôit

**Tonul conteazƒÉ**: √én englezƒÉ, tonul vocii poate schimba complet sensul unei fraze. PracticƒÉ sƒÉ vorbe»ôti cu cƒÉldurƒÉ »ôi z√¢mbet √Æn voce.

**Contactul vizual**: C√¢nd spui aceste fraze, men»õine contactul vizual pentru a transmite sinceritate.

**Timing-ul e totul**: Alege momentul potrivit pentru fiecare tip de compliment. Replicile jucƒÉu»ôe func»õioneazƒÉ bine √Æn momente relaxate, √Æn timp ce expresiile romantice profunde sunt mai potrivite pentru momente intime.

**Fii autentic**: Cel mai important lucru este sƒÉ fii sincer. Partenerul tƒÉu va aprecia efortul tƒÉu, chiar dacƒÉ pronun»õia nu e perfectƒÉ.

## Concluzie

Flirtul √Æn englezƒÉ poate pƒÉrea intimidant la √Ænceput, dar cu practicƒÉ devine natural. Aminte»ôte-»õi cƒÉ partenerul tƒÉu va aprecia efortul tƒÉu de a comunica √Æn limba lor. √éncepe cu expresii simple »ôi construie»ôte-»õi √Æncrederea treptat. Cel mai important, distreazƒÉ-te »ôi lasƒÉ romantismul sƒÉ curgƒÉ natural!

articles.title: –ê–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞: —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ —Ç–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';

# –ê–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞: —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ —Ç–∞ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–æ–≥–æ –¥–Ω—è

–í–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è ‚Äî —Ü–µ –æ–¥–∏–Ω —ñ–∑ –Ω–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à–∏—Ö –¥–Ω—ñ–≤ —É –∂–∏—Ç—Ç—ñ –ø–∞—Ä–∏. –Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –∑–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–¥–æ–Ω–æ–º, –≤–∞—à –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–ª—è—î –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é, –∞–±–æ –≤–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ —Ö–æ—á–µ—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ –∫–æ–≥–æ—Å—å –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏ ‚Äî —Ü—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—Ç—è –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—Å!

–¢—É—Ç –≤–∏ –∑–Ω–∞–π–¥–µ—Ç–µ –Ω–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à—É –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–∞—É –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫—É: –≤—ñ–¥ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∏—Ö —Å–ª—ñ–≤ –¥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–∏—Ö —Ç–æ—Å—Ç—ñ–≤ —Ç–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω—å.

<PhraseOfDay
  phrase="Congratulations!"
  translation="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é! / –©–∏—Ä–æ –≤—ñ—Ç–∞—é!"
  context="–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç"
/>

## –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞

–ü–æ—á–Ω–µ–º–æ –∑ –Ω–∞–π–≤–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ—à–∏—Ö —Å–ª—ñ–≤, —è–∫—ñ –≤–∞–º –∑–Ω–∞–¥–æ–±–ª—è—Ç—å—Å—è:


<VocabCard 
  word="wedding"
  translation="–≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è"
  pronunciation="/Ààwed…™≈ã/"
  example="Our wedding will be in June."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—à–µ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –±—É–¥–µ —É —á–µ—Ä–≤–Ω—ñ."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="bride"
  translation="–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞"
  pronunciation="/bra…™d/"
  example="The bride looks beautiful."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞ –≤–∏–≥–ª—è–¥–∞—î —á—É–¥–æ–≤–æ."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="groom"
  translation="–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–π"
  pronunciation="/…°ruÀêm/"
  example="The groom is waiting at the altar."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–π —á–µ–∫–∞—î –±—ñ–ª—è –≤—ñ–≤—Ç–∞—Ä—è."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="vows"
  translation="–∫–ª—è—Ç–≤–∏ / –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ"
  pronunciation="/va äz/"
  example="They wrote their own vows."
  exampleTranslation="–í–æ–Ω–∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–ª–∏ –≤–ª–∞—Å–Ω—ñ –∫–ª—è—Ç–≤–∏."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="I do"
  translation="–¢–∞–∫, –∑–≥–æ–¥–µ–Ω/–∑–≥–æ–¥–Ω–∞"
  pronunciation="/a…™ duÀê/"
  example="When you say "I do", you are married."
  exampleTranslation="–ö–æ–ª–∏ –≤–∏ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ "I do", –≤–∏ –æ–¥—Ä—É–∂–µ–Ω—ñ."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="wedding ring"
  translation="–æ–±—Ä—É—á–∫–∞"
  pronunciation="/Ààwed…™≈ã r…™≈ã/"
  example="He placed the wedding ring on her finger."
  exampleTranslation="–í—ñ–Ω –Ω–∞–¥—ñ–≤ –æ–±—Ä—É—á–∫—É –Ω–∞ —ó—ó –ø–∞–ª–µ—Ü—å."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="ceremony"
  translation="—Ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è"
  pronunciation="/Ààser…ôm…ôni/"
  example="The ceremony was very emotional."
  exampleTranslation="–¶–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è –±—É–ª–∞ –¥—É–∂–µ –∑–≤–æ—Ä—É—à–ª–∏–≤–æ—é."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="reception"
  translation="–±–∞–Ω–∫–µ—Ç / –ø—Ä–∏–π–æ–º"
  pronunciation="/r…™Ààsep Én/"
  example="The reception is at 7 PM."
  exampleTranslation="–ë–∞–Ω–∫–µ—Ç –æ 19:00."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="best man"
  translation="—Å–≤—ñ–¥–æ–∫ (–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–æ–≥–æ)"
  pronunciation="/best m√¶n/"
  example="My brother will be the best man."
  exampleTranslation="–ú—ñ–π –±—Ä–∞—Ç –±—É–¥–µ —Å–≤—ñ–¥–∫–æ–º."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="maid of honor"
  translation="—Å–≤—ñ–¥–æ–∫ (–Ω–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–æ—ó)"
  pronunciation="/me…™d …ôv Àà…ín…ôr/"
  example="Her sister is the maid of honor."
  exampleTranslation="–á—ó —Å–µ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞ –±—É–¥–µ —Å–≤—ñ–¥–∫–æ–º."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="toast"
  translation="—Ç–æ—Å—Ç"
  pronunciation="/t…ô äst/"
  example="Let me raise a toast to the happy couple!"
  exampleTranslation="–î–æ–∑–≤–æ–ª—å—Ç–µ –ø—ñ–¥–Ω—è—Ç–∏ —Ç–æ—Å—Ç –∑–∞ —â–∞—Å–ª–∏–≤—É –ø–∞—Ä—É!"
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="Congratulations!"
  translation="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é! / –©–∏—Ä–æ –≤—ñ—Ç–∞—é!"
  pronunciation="/k…ônÀå…°r√¶t ÉuÀàle…™ Énz/"
  example="Congratulations on your wedding!"
  exampleTranslation="–í—ñ—Ç–∞—é –∑ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è–º!"
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="newlyweds"
  translation="–º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç–∞"
  pronunciation="/ÀànjuÀêliwedz/"
  example="The newlyweds left for their honeymoon."
  exampleTranslation="–ú–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç–∞ –ø–æ—ó—Ö–∞–ª–∏ —É –º–µ–¥–æ–≤–∏–π –º—ñ—Å—è—Ü—å."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="wedding dress"
  translation="–≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω–∞ —Å—É–∫–Ω—è"
  pronunciation="/Ààwed…™≈ã dres/"
  example="She chose a beautiful wedding dress."
  exampleTranslation="–í–æ–Ω–∞ –æ–±—Ä–∞–ª–∞ —á—É–¥–æ–≤—É –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É —Å—É–∫–Ω—é."
/>

<VocabCard 
  word="bouquet"
  translation="–±—É–∫–µ—Ç"
  pronunciation="/buÀàke…™/"
  example="The bride threw the bouquet."
  exampleTranslation="–ù–∞—Ä–µ—á–µ–Ω–∞ –∫–∏–Ω—É–ª–∞ –±—É–∫–µ—Ç."
/>


## –¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω—ñ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏

### –ü—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç

–ù–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—ñ –ø—Ä–∏–π–Ω—è—Ç–æ –≤—ñ—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç. –û—Å—å –∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω–∏—Ö —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑ –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é:

| –ê–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–∞ | –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞ |
|----------------|------------|
| Congratulations! | –í—ñ—Ç–∞—é! |
| toast | –¢–æ—Å—Ç! |

<CultureTip>
–í–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ—ó –≤—ñ–¥—Ä—ñ–∑–Ω—è—é—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ —Ä—ñ–∑–Ω–∏—Ö –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö. –ù–∞–ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥, —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–∞ —Ü–µ—Ä–µ–º–æ–Ω—ñ—è –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é –º–æ–∂–µ –≤–∫–ª—é—á–∞—Ç–∏ —É–Ω—ñ–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ä–∏—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏ —Ç–∞ –∑–≤–∏—á–∞—ó, —è–∫—ñ –≤–∞—Ä—Ç–æ –∑–Ω–∞—Ç–∏ –∑–∞–∑–¥–∞–ª–µ–≥—ñ–¥—å.
</CultureTip>

## –û—Ä–≥–∞–Ω—ñ–∑–∞—Ü—ñ—è –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è

–Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è –∑ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º, —è–∫–∏–π —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–ª—è—î –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é, –≤–∞–º –∑–Ω–∞–¥–æ–±–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫–∞ –¥–ª—è –æ–±–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–µ–π:

### –ú—ñ—Å—Ü–µ –ø—Ä–æ–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–Ω—è
- –¶–µ—Ä–∫–≤–∞ / –•—Ä–∞–º
- –†–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∞–Ω
- –ì–æ—Ç–µ–ª—å
- –ù–∞ –≤—ñ–¥–∫—Ä–∏—Ç–æ–º—É –ø–æ–≤—ñ—Ç—Ä—ñ

### –í–∞–∂–ª–∏–≤—ñ –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª—ñ
- –ó–∞–ø—Ä–æ—à–µ–Ω–Ω—è –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
- –í–∏–±—ñ—Ä –¥–∞—Ç–∏
- –î—Ä–µ—Å-–∫–æ–¥
- –ú–µ–Ω—é

## –í–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Ç–æ—Å—Ç–∏

–¢—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–∏–π —Ç–æ—Å—Ç –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é ‚Äî —Ü–µ —Ü—ñ–ª–µ –º–∏—Å—Ç–µ—Ü—Ç–≤–æ! –û—Å—å –∫—ñ–ª—å–∫–∞ –ø–æ—Ä–∞–¥:

1. **–ü–æ—á–Ω—ñ—Ç—å –∑ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞–Ω–Ω—è** ‚Äî –∑–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—ñ—Ç—å—Å—è –¥–æ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç —Ç–∞ –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π
2. **–ü–æ–¥—ñ–ª—ñ—Ç—å—Å—è —ñ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä—ñ—î—é** ‚Äî —Ä–æ–∑–∫–∞–∂—ñ—Ç—å —â–æ—Å—å –æ—Å–æ–±–∏—Å—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–æ –ø–∞—Ä—É
3. **–ü–æ–±–∞–∂–∞–π—Ç–µ —â–∞—Å—Ç—è** ‚Äî –∑–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à—ñ—Ç—å —Ç–µ–ø–ª–∏–º–∏ –ø–æ–±–∞–∂–∞–Ω–Ω—è–º–∏
4. **–ü—ñ–¥–Ω—ñ–º—ñ—Ç—å –∫–µ–ª–∏—Ö** ‚Äî —Ç—Ä–∞–¥–∏—Ü—ñ–π–Ω–æ –∫–∞–∂—É—Ç—å —Ç–æ—Å—Ç –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥ —Ç–∏–º, —è–∫ –≤–∏–ø–∏—Ç–∏

<CultureTip>
–£ –±–∞–≥–∞—Ç—å–æ—Ö –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–∞—Ö —Ç–æ—Å—Ç —Å—É–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∂—É—î—Ç—å—Å—è –æ—Å–æ–±–ª–∏–≤–∏–º–∏ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º–∏. –î—ñ–∑–Ω–∞–π—Ç–µ—Å—è –∑–∞–∑–¥–∞–ª–µ–≥—ñ–¥—å, —è–∫—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–π–Ω—è—Ç—ñ –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—ñ –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é.
</CultureTip>

## –í–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—ñ –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ

–Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∏ –ø–ª–∞–Ω—É—î—Ç–µ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞—Ç–∏ –≤–ª–∞—Å–Ω—ñ –æ–±—ñ—Ç–Ω–∏—Ü—ñ –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é, –æ—Å—å –∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω–∞ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∞:

1. –ó–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–µ–Ω–Ω—è –¥–æ –ø–∞—Ä—Ç–Ω–µ—Ä–∞
2. –ß–æ–º—É –≤–∏ –π–æ–≥–æ/—ó—ó –∫–æ—Ö–∞—î—Ç–µ
3. –í–∞—à—ñ –æ–±—ñ—Ü—è–Ω–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –º–∞–π–±—É—Ç–Ω—î
4. –ó–∞–≤–µ—Ä—à–∞–ª—å–Ω—ñ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –ª—é–±–æ–≤—ñ

## –ö–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω—ñ –≤–∏—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–π

–Ø–∫—â–æ –≤–∞—Å –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—Å–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª–ª—è, –¥–µ —Ä–æ–∑–º–æ–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—å –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é, –∑–∞–ø–∞–º'—è—Ç–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ü—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏:

- –Ø–∫ –ø—Ä–∏–≤—ñ—Ç–∞—Ç–∏ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥—è—Ç
- –Ø–∫ –≤—ñ–¥–ø–æ–≤—ñ—Å—Ç–∏ –Ω–∞ –∑–∞–ø—Ä–æ—à–µ–Ω–Ω—è
- –Ø–∫ –ø–æ–¥—è–∫—É–≤–∞—Ç–∏ –∑–∞ –≥–æ—Å—Ç–∏–Ω–Ω—ñ—Å—Ç—å

## –ü–æ–¥–∞–ª—å—à–µ –≤–∏–≤—á–µ–Ω–Ω—è

–¢–µ–ø–µ—Ä –≤–∏ –∑–Ω–∞—î—Ç–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—É –≤–µ—Å—ñ–ª—å–Ω—É –ª–µ–∫—Å–∏–∫—É –∞–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–æ—é! –ü—Ä–æ–¥–æ–≤–∂—É–π—Ç–µ –≤–∏–≤—á–∞—Ç–∏ –º–æ–≤—É –∑—ñ —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—Ç—è–º–∏:

- [–ê–Ω–≥–ª—ñ–π—Å—å–∫–∞ —Ä–æ–º–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—á–Ω—ñ —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–∞—Ä](/uk/blog/english-romantic-phrases-for-couples)
